title.narrative: Developing the Balochistan Education Sector Plan

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative supports the Government of Balochistan to formulate a Balochistan Education Sector Plan (BESP) through UNICEF. The Plan will provide strategic directions and operational framework for the provincial Government and the development partners to implement education reforms in line with the objectives and plan of actions specified in the National Education Policy. The key goals are: to develop a sector plan and its action plans, owned politically and by stakeholders in Balochistan, under which all stakeholders aim to coordinate and achieve the commitments and goals stipulated at both national and international levels; and to strengthen the capacity of the provincial department of P&#38;#38;D, Finance, Social Welfare &#38;#38; Special Education and Education to plan, manage and lead the sector planning for education reform and its implementation/monitoring. The total value of this initiative is $1.7 million over 2 years, starting 2010-11.
